alert.note: Alert for Smith; Upshur; Wood (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 11:59PM CDT until June 16 at 1:00AM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Smith County in northeastern Texas... Wood County in northeastern Texas... Southwestern Upshur County in northeastern Texas... * Until 100 AM CDT. * At 1159 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southeast of Pleasant Grove to near Edgewood, moving southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Gilmer, Mineola, Lindale, Quitman, Big Sandy, Hawkins, Hoard, Lake Fork Reservoir, Hainesville, Golden, Forest Hill, Alba, Red Springs, Carroll and Pritchett. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Large hail and damaging winds and continuous cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Move indoors immediately. Lightning is one of nature`s leading killers. Remember, if you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning.
